definition: the millions place (or column) in the decimal system

pinyin: bai3 wan4 dun1 ji2 he2 wu3 qi4
deng3 xiao4 bai3 wan4 dun1 dang1 liang4
Xi1 zang4 Bai3 wan4 Nong2 nu2 Jie3 Fang4 Ji4 nian4 ri4
containing_words.word: 西藏百万农奴解放纪念日

sentences.english: During the first half of this year, the country added a total of 26 million new Internet users.
sentences.chinese: 在今年的上半年，全国的网民增加了两千六百万。

sentences.english: Millions of residences remain without power and water.
sentences.chinese: 数百万户家庭依然断水断电。

sentences.english: The South Korean government spends millions promoting contemporary Korean culture abroad.
sentences.chinese: 韩国政府花了数百万的钱推广当代韩国文化。

sentences.english: Many million years ago the territory of the present Perm region was occupied by the Perm Sea.
sentences.chinese: 现在的彼尔姆地区在数百万年前还属于彼尔姆海。

sentences.english: The population of New Zealand is now three million(s).
sentences.chinese: 新西兰现有人口三百万。

sentences.english: A single rookery may contain as many as a million penguins.
sentences.chinese: 一个群栖地可以容纳上百万个企鹅。

sentences.english: The key account manager must possess significant skill to run a multi-million dollar business.
sentences.chinese: 大客户经理须具备经营数百万美元生意的重要技能。

sentences.english: Diatoms are also quite numerous, with the estimated number of species exceeding one million.
sentences.chinese: 硅藻种类也相当多，估计超过1百万种。

sentences.english: What if I have several million transactions?
sentences.chinese: 如果有几百万个事务怎么办？

sentences.english: But learn from them. They scale and serve millions of users.
sentences.chinese: 而是从中学习，他们服务于数以百万的用户。

sentences.english: The album itself sold over two-million copies and reached the Top 20.
sentences.chinese: 这张专辑本身的销量超过两百万份，并达到前20名。

sentences.english: Berlin estimates it lost a record five million euros last year to fare dodgers.
sentences.chinese: 柏林估计它去年由于逃票人造成了五百万英镑的损失。

sentences.english: Marseille offered him a deal, but it was worth around €7 million over three seasons.
sentences.chinese: 马赛给他提供的合同三年才7百万欧。

sentences.english: I had noting in the world but a million-pound note.
sentences.chinese: 除了一张百万英磅的钞票外，我一无所有。

sentences.english: Two million? Two million was Voytek's figure.
sentences.chinese: 两百万，佛伊泰克觉得是两百万。

sentences.english: Two million? Two million was Voytek's figure.
sentences.chinese: 两百万，佛伊泰克觉得是两百万。

definition: over ten thousand/fig. untold numbers/innumerable/thousands upon thousands
ten million/countless/many/one must by all means
easily/readily/frequently/at every turn/at the slightest pretext
lit. their number cannot be counted (idiom); fig. countless/innumerable
